ygData.subject: Clan Singapura?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yo dudes, Ever though of setting a gang for S pore kakis?  I think with quite a few of us in Innoruuk, it s time for us to setup a local gang.  This is not a
ygData.messageBody:
Yo dudes,

Ever though of setting a gang for S'pore kakis? I think with quite a few
of us in Innoruuk, it's time for us to setup a local gang. This is not a
guild like UO, just an informal group for local players only. Of coz we
still need a guild master to talk to game GM to setup a 'guild' - I
recommend the oldest (or highest lvl) EQ players in S'pore to hold the
position of 'guildmaster'. Again I must stress, this is just an informal
gang - no guild activities or structure, but just a recognition for local
players, and make it easy for other new local players to identify us. Thus
we must think of a 'localized' name, eg Clan Singapura, one look we know
it's a S'pore gang liao. Feasible?

Ziltus
